MarkerCameraPreview
protected final class MarkerCameraPreview.CaptureAnalyzer

Analyzes a captured frame and sends it to the augmented reality toolkit to detect markers in it.

 void detectFrame(byte[] image)
          Detects markers on a image frame, converted from YUV420 to RGB, and activates them until the next frame is grabbed.

Method Detail

detectFrame

public final void detectFrame(byte[] image)
Detects markers on a image frame, converted from YUV420 to RGB, and activates them until the next frame is grabbed. It also requests the renderer surface to call the render routine and prompts the capture timer to re-register

Parameters:
image -
